nodes.bodyText: Does this feature need to be restricted to jdk15? If not, turning it on via the option should be allowed for all versions.
I was under the impression the feature was new for JDK15 of the RI. Having said that, it should work fine with older JCLs.
Does the Throwable method which retrieves the extended message exist pre-JDK15?

Only JDK15+ has the support of NPE helpful message via https://github.com/ibmruntimes/openj9-openjdk-jdk15/blob/425fa83a6d01232c99cb7eaa3f5ff9f724c7b27c/src/java.base/share/classes/java/lang/NullPointerException.java#L131
So it won't work for pre-JDK15 versions even it is on by default.
#9844 requires JCL patch.

Does the Throwable method which retrieves the extended message exist pre-JDK15?

No, only JDK15+ NullPointerException has the method to retrieve the extended messages.
Ok, it can be dealt with via #9844 then.
